laboratory_examinations.findings: QT prolongation (QTm 600 ms, QTc 577 ms) and presence of delta wave.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: QT prolongation noted again after ablation (QTm 640 ms, QTc 604 ms).

laboratory_examinations.findings: Documented polymorphic ventricular tachycardias (torsade de pointes) with a duration of 50 s, self-terminating.
